alert.note: Alert for Harper; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Woods, Harper and northern Woodward Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1059 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Aetna to 11 miles north of Buffalo to 7 miles west of Englewood. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laverne, Buffalo, Freedom, Rosston, Selman, and Camp Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
